vlive.korean: 나 예언한 거 얘기해도 되나? Can I talk about my prediction? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 🐥🐸🍨
vlive.english: Can I talk about my prediction?

vlive.korean: 떡볶이가 세상을 구한다는 예언가가 나타났다! There's a Tteokbokki prophet! 듣기 View video WINNER : 숙제도우미(숙제 도와드립니다)
[머쓱해진 예언자(?)] - 고생하셨습니다 - 다음으로 가볼까요? [Awkward prophet] - Good job. - Shall we move on? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.8
vlive.english: [Awkward prophet] - Good job. - Shall we move on?

vlive.korean: [뭐지...? 본인 얘기 예언한 건가...?] - 다음 거는... - 이거는... [What? Did you predict yours?] - The next one... - This... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.100
vlive.english: [What? Did you predict yours?] - The next one... - This...

vlive.korean: [아아... RM의 예언이 현실이 되었습니다] 내가 말했잖아, 아까 떼라고! [And RM's prediction came true] I told you to take it off quickly! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.95
vlive.english: [And RM's prediction came true] I told you to take it off quickly!

examples.korean: prophetic utterances 발음듣기 예언. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
She prophesied that she would win a gold medal. 발음듣기 그녀는 자기가 금메달을 탈 것이라고 예언했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She prophesied that she would win a gold medal. 발음

examples.korean: The witch foretold that she would marry a prince. 발음듣기 그녀가 왕자와 결혼을 할 것이라고 마녀가 예언했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The witch foretold that she would marry a prince. 발음

examples.korean: Many of his warnings proved prophetic. 발음듣기 그의 경고들 중 많은 것들이 예언이었음이 입증되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many of his warnings proved prophetic. 발음

examples.korean: Officials concerned with environmental policy predict that a day of reckoning will come. 발음듣기 환경 정책을 염려하는 공직자들은 심판의 날이 올 것이라고 예언한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Officials concerned with environmental policy predict that a day of reckoning will come. 발음
